query.query: {"measures":[["sum","percent"]],"pigql":"q = load \"<opportunity>\"; won_this_year = filter q by 'IsWon' == \"true\";won_this_year = filter won_this_year by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year\"..\"current day\"];closed_this_year = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"true\"; closed_this_year = filter closed_this_year by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year\"..\"current day\"];won_last_year = filter q by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; won_last_year = filter won_last_year by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year - 1 year\"..\"current day - 1 year\"];closed_last_year = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"true\"; closed_last_year = filter closed_last_year by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year - 1 year\"..\"current day - 1 year\"];result = group won_this_year by all full, closed_this_year by all full, won_last_year by all full, closed_last_year by all;result = foreach result generate sum(won_this_year['Amount']) as 'A', sum(closed_this_year['Amount']) as 'B', sum(won_last_year['Amount']) as 'C', sum(closed_last_year['Amount']) as 'D';result = foreach result generate ((A/B) - (C/D)) / (C/D) as 'sum_percent';result = foreach result generate (case when 'sum_percent' < 0 then \"#D4504C\" when 'sum_percent' > 0 then \"#3CAF6D\" else \"#7D98B3\" end) as 'color', 'sum_percent' as 'sum_percent';"}

{"pigql":"a = load \"<opportunity>\"; a = filter a by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"1 year ago\"..\"current year\"]; a = filter a by 'IsClosed' == \"true\"; a = filter a by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; a = group a by ('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Quarter');  a = foreach a generate 'CloseDate_Year' + \"~~~\" + 'CloseDate_Quarter' as 'CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Quarter', sum('CloseDate_day_epoch') - sum('CreatedDate_day_epoch') as 'Days_Open'; a = foreach a generate 'CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Quarter' as 'CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Quarter', avg('Days_Open') as 'avg_Days_Open';","measures":[["avg","Days_Open"]],"groups":[["CloseDate_Year","CloseDate_Quarter"]]}

{"measures":[["sum","percent"]],"pigql":"q = load \"<opportunity>\"; q = filter q by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; this_year = filter q by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year\"..\"current day\"]; last_year = filter q by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year - 1 year\"..\"current day - 1 year\"]; this_year = foreach this_year generate avg('Amount') as 'Amount'; last_year = foreach last_year generate avg('Amount') as 'Amount'; result = group this_year by all full, last_year by all; result = foreach result generate (avg(this_year['Amount']) - avg(last_year['Amount']))/avg(last_year['Amount']) as 'sum_percent'; result = foreach result generate (case when 'sum_percent' < 0 then \"#D4504C\" when 'sum_percent' > 0 then \"#3CAF6D\" else \"#7D98B3\" end) as 'color', 'sum_percent' as 'sum_percent';"}

{"measures":[["avg","Days_Open"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<opportunity>\"; a = filter a by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year\"..\"current day\"]; a = filter a by 'IsClosed' == \"true\"; a = filter a by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; a = foreach a generate sum('CloseDate_day_epoch') - sum('CreatedDate_day_epoch') as 'Days_Open'; a = group a by all; a = foreach a generate (case when avg('Days_Open') < 0 then \"#D4504C\" when avg('Days_Open') > 0 then \"#3CAF6D\" else \"#7D98B3\" end) as 'color', avg('Days_Open') as 'avg_Days_Open';","groups":["color"]}

{"measures":[["sum","percent"]],"pigql":"q = load \"<opportunity>\"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"true\"; q = filter q by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; a = filter q by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year - 1 year\"..\"current day - 1 year\"]; b = filter q by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year\"..\"current day\"]; a = foreach a generate sum('CloseDate_day_epoch') - sum('CreatedDate_day_epoch') as 'Days_Open'; b = foreach b generate sum('CloseDate_day_epoch') - sum('CreatedDate_day_epoch') as 'Days_Open'; c = group a by all full, b by all; c = foreach c generate avg(a.'Days_Open') as 'A', avg(b.'Days_Open') as 'B'; c = foreach c generate (B-A)/A as 'sum_percent'; c = foreach c generate (case when 'sum_percent' > 0 then \"#D4504C\" when 'sum_percent' < 0 then \"#3CAF6D\" else \"#7D98B3\" end) as 'color', 'sum_percent' as 'sum_percent';","groups":[]}

{"measures":[["sum","percent"]],"pigql":"q = load \"<opportunity>\"; q = filter q by 'IsWon' == \"true\";this_year = filter q by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year\"..\"current day\"];last_year = filter q by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year - 1 year\"..\"current day - 1 year\"]; this_year = foreach this_year generate sum('Amount') as 'Amount';last_year = foreach last_year generate sum('Amount') as 'Amount';result = group this_year by all full, last_year by all; result = foreach result generate (sum(this_year['Amount']) - sum(last_year['Amount']))/sum(last_year['Amount']) as 'sum_percent'; result = foreach result generate 'sum_percent', (case when 'sum_percent' > 0 then \"#3CAF6D\" when 'sum_percent' < 0 then \"#D4504C\" else \"#7D98B3\" end) as 'color';"}

parameters.text: Sales Wave gives sales leaders, managers and reps the power to track and grow their business through relevant and actionable insights.

Sales Wave gives sales leaders, managers and reps the power to track and grow their business through relevant and actionable insights.

Click on any of the dashboards to view more.
